short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds public comment section to every webpage

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Engage in public discourse anywhere on the web.

GRAFFITI allows you to leave and view comments Craigslist ads, articles, even videos where comments are disabled! Move the conversation to GRAFFITI where you can share your two cents about anything on the web.

Came across an item on Craigslist that's up your friend's alley? Tag her in a post on that page - she'll be notified with a link to the page and your conversation about it has already started!

Creating your account is quick and easy and, of course, free. You can see a history of all your ongoing conversations and you'll receive alerts when someone posts a response or tags you. You can unfollow any conversation to stop receiving alerts about it.

What are you waiting for? Come join the conversation.
